top.title: Trump mulls 'very strong' military options as hundreds killed in Iran protests
top.summary: The US president says Iranian leaders have called "to negotiate", but adds the US "may have to act" before a meeting.

top.title: Referee and student among hundreds killed in Iran protests
top.summary: More than 500 people have been killed during anti-government protests, a US-based human rights group says.

top.title: US justice department opens criminal probe into Fed chair Jerome Powell
top.summary: Powell called the investigation unprecedented following his refusal to cut interest rates despite demands by Donald Trump.

top.title: Ofcom investigates Elon Musk's X over Grok AI sexual deepfakes
top.summary: The watchdog said it had received reports of the platform's Grok AI chatbot creating undressed images of people.

top.title: Eggie, Neo, Isaac and Memo are domestic robots. But would you let them load your dishwasher?
top.summary: Joe Tidy meets robots being trained to tidy up all your mess.

top.title: Malaysia and Indonesia block Musk's Grok over explicit deepfakes
top.summary: Sexualised images of real people generated by Grok have circulated on X in recent weeks.
